rules: Never play on an empty stomach
If life gives you lemons, make lemonade!
Sell lemonade for a higher price than it cost you to make it
Buy some of each ingredient at the store
Be careful not to spend more money than you have
Figure out how much your lemonade cost to make, and then sell it for more than that
But don't make it TOO expensive, or else people might not buy it.
You win the game when you have more than $100
To make it onto the high score list, try to make your last round a very profitable one!
